SEARCH
Package com.petfoster.services

Class AdoptionHistoryService

java.lang.Object
com.petfoster.services.AdoptionHistoryService
@Service public class AdoptionHistoryService extends Object
AdoptionHistoryService provides services for managing AdoptionHistory entities. This service class handles CRUD operations and data mapping for AdoptionHistoryDTO and AdoptionHistory entities.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Team

    • deleteAdoptionHistory

      public void deleteAdoptionHistory(Long id)
      Deletes an adoption history record by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the adoption history record to delete.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the adoption history record is not found.
